name: Chromotective
description:
Put together the pieces of the story and repair your memories to find out the truth about the case in this film-noire inspired mistery.

How to play:

Drag and drop the fragments of text to insert them into the diary. You can modify the order after that too. Use the mouse wheel to move between pages of the diary.

Developed for Global Game Jam 2020 (https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/chromotectiv-7)
